function.name: StateChange
function.description: This callback is called when a device's state changes.

function.name: Cleared
function.description: This callback is called when a device table has been cleared.

function.name: BindResponse
function.description: This callback is called when a device received a bind request.

function.name: BindingTableResponse
function.description: This callback is called when a device received a binding table request.
